text: Nikola "Niko" Mirotić (Serbian Cyrillic: Никола Миротић; born February 11, 1991) is a Spanish-Montenegrin professional basketball player for the Chicago Bulls of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He was contracted in 2014 for the Bulls. He is a 2.09 m (6 ft 10.25 in) tall 107 kg (236 lb.)[ ACB.com Spanish ACB League official player profile .] power forward. He was born in Titograd, SR Montenegro, SFR Yugoslavia. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:Montenegrin sportspeople Category:New Orleans Pelicans players Category:Olympic medalists for Spain Category:Power forwards Category:Spanish basketball players
title: Nikola Mirotić
